thread.title: The Casio Edifice EQB501 takes a licking, connects to your cellphone
thread.title_full: The Casio Edifice EQB501 takes a licking, connects to your cellphone

author: blogsonjapan
title: The Casio Edifice EQB501 takes a licking, connects to your cellphone
text:
Source: techcrunch.com 
Casio makes beefy watches for not-always-beefy people. Their latest, the Edifice EQB-501 is an interesting amalgam of form, function, and high tech features and it has enough dials, buttons, and sensors to keep well-connected on your trek through the jungle, urban or otherwise. This monster watch is 44.4mm wide and water resistant up to 100 meters. It connects to your phone and the CASIOâ€¦ Read More
